node.title: Woman arrested after assault at Hamilton Kmart
node.description: Police have arrested a woman in relation to an assault at the central Hamilton Kmart store on Saturday.
node.content:
["Police have arrested a woman in relation to an assault at the central Hamilton Kmart store on Saturday.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "The woman, 24, yesterday appeared in Hamilton District Court charged with aggravated assault, aggravated injury, shoplifting and theft.", "She was remanded in custody to reappear on 2 May.", "Police have also identified a second offender - a 26-year-old woman - and police are trying to locate her for arrest."]
